name: volumetric tunnel
desc: Produce a volumetric extrusion along a line.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Merge Continuous Paths
properties.desc: The Merge Continuous Path toggle controls whether continuous lines and polylines will be handled as single, connected lines to obtain a smooth extrusion without intermediary end caps.

properties.name: Max Step Distance
properties.desc: The Max Step Distance is the maximal distance to subdivide the path by. Generally, cells will never be longer than this distance, but may be shorter at the end of a segment.

properties.name: Offset
properties.desc: The Offset value controls the initial translation of the two-dimensional cross section to allow off-center extrusion or move off-centered cross sections to the origin.

properties.name: Phase Determination
properties.desc: The Phase Determination is controls the orientation of the input surface along the path. When using Perpendicular Extrusion the surface is extruded perpendicular to the segments of the path. If only rotations around the Z axis should be allowed regardless of the path direction, use Force Z Up.

properties.name: Scale Factor By
properties.desc: The Scale Factor By choice allows the user to choose constant or data dependent scaling.

properties.name: Constant Data For Scale Factor
properties.desc: If Scale Factor By is set to Constant, the constant scale factor can be set using this control.

properties.name: Nodal Data For Scale Factor
properties.desc: The Nodal Data for Scale Factor allows you to choose the nodal data component for scaling.

properties.name: Cell Data For Scale Factor
properties.desc: The Cell Data for Scale Factor allows you to choose the cell data component for scaling.

properties.name: Rotate By
properties.desc: The Rotate By choice allows the user to choose constant or data dependent rotation.

properties.name: Constant Data For Rotation
properties.desc: If Rotate By is set to Constant, the Constant Data For Rotation can be set using this control.

properties.name: Nodal Data For Rotation
properties.desc: The Nodal Data for Rotation allows you to choose the nodal data component for rotation.

properties.name: Cell Data For Rotation
properties.desc: The Cell Data for Rotation allows you to choose the cell data component for rotation.

properties.name: Map Nodal Data
properties.desc: The Map Nodal Data options allow the user to select those nodal data components that are used for coloring or subsequent subsetting operations.

properties.name: Map Cell Data
properties.desc: The Map Cell Data options allow the user to select those cell data components that are used for coloring or subsequent subsetting operations.
